contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 1, 1982 D NSW State Championships (Junior B Grade)
NSW State Championships (Junior B Grade) 120 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest NSW State Championships nsw-state-championships-junior-b-grade
None Australia
Youth
Lane Cove Civic Centre, New South Wales, Australia Taken from programme. The NSW website archive also erroneously includes entries from the De La Salle colleges in Bankstown and Revesby, both of which in fact competed in the Junior D Grade. The listed website pieces and scores for those bands in this grade do not match what they played in that grade in this year.
Sept. 17, 2014, 12:46 p.m. Feb. 11, 2017, 12:26 p.m.
1 St.Patricks College Sutherland (NSW) Reg Bishop From the New World [arr. Rimmer]
2 St Ignatius College Harold Kellett Sinfonietta for Brass Band [Langford]
3 Sutherland Shire Brass Frank McGuinness Cornish Festival Overture
4 Armidale City Band Trevor Reid Rococo Variations on a Theme of Tchaikovsky [Street]
